transcript: Somewhere out there is a giant mass of silverfish all swimming in this direction. They don't know why we don't know why They didn't get an invitation. There wasn't a vote. It wasn't a decision. Nobody sent them a map or or anything like that

They didn't get an invitation. There wasn't a vote. It wasn't a decision. Nobody sent them a map or or anything like that

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Somewhere out there, is a giant mass of silver fish all swimming in this direction.  They don't know why and we don't know why. They didn't get an invitation.  And it wasn't a vote- it wasn't a decision.  And nobody sent them a map or anything like that.
